replies.body:
{{champion:121}} "Yes, I finally have my own skin line again. After the guardians of the sands stole my idea. But there is only one Death Blossom, me."

{{champion:60}} "Ahem."

{{champion:121}} **"AHHHHH, WHO ARE YOU?"**

{{champion:60}} "I am Death Blossom Elise, most have forgotten about me after Blood Moon Elise came out. But I was all the rage back in the day."

{{champion:121}} "Elise has two skins?"

{{champion:60}} "Three actually, I got a victorious skin as well."

{{champion:121}} "Wait, Rito seriously made your second skin only available to gold+, how unfair is that?"

{{champion:60}} "I am not the only skin who has been left and forgotten. Many skins are forsaken by their owners, after they get the newer thing. Take this for example, Elderwood Bard, poor guy wasn't even popular on release. But now with Snowday Bard, no one uses him."

{{champion:432}} "♪♪♪♪......."

{{champion:60}} "And poor Galactic Azir, few got the stargate reference, and fewer still bought him."

{{champion:268}} "No kingdom, no family, only sand. Will make sand sculptures for food."

{{champion:60}} "Blight Crystal Varus, Lord Darius. Not many even remember these guys exist. But poor Sion, he has it the worst. All of his skins are abused and caged up, no one has seen hextech in years. And with Rito refusing to give him a new skin, things do not bode well for our undead juggernaut."

{{champion:14}} "Is this, what passes for love?"

{{champion:60}} "With just a mere donation of 10 Riot Points a day, we can help these underused skins find good homes. Please, do your part. And don't forget to use those old skins in a match every once and a while. They would really enjoy."

_**Cuts to slightly disturbing scenes of really cute skins being replaced or refunded.**_
Cue background song* In the arms of an angel...
Join in the next 30 minutes and we will send you a tote bag with giant enemy{{champion:6}} on it. Plz join 4 free tote bags
As a special offer, the first 100 subscribers will receive a complementary Ward of Draven, along with any Harrowing-themed summoner icon they choose.
We'll even throw in an Undertaker {{champion:83}} , but you better hurry, lines are filling up fast (at least we hope they do)
Please, help us make a difference. Even though obviously we can't do anything about making bad skins good, still give us your money.
But wait, there's more! If you call now, I'll even add in a poro plushie! Please call now, tons of poros and old skins need your help and support for just 120 easy payments of 16.50 RP.

What about Mecha Zero Sion possibly upcoming on the PBE?

"Is this, what passes for love?"
i read this in his voice, yelling, made me laugh so hard
Take my up-vote, to keep Sion off the junk.
NO, no , no. Elderwood bard is a thing of beauty. Stop.

Galactic Azir is a Stargate reference? I never noticed anything that referenced it?

EDIT: Ohhh, looking at the splash I see him coming out of one now. Wow, can't believe I never noticed that.
Also his recall has him in a bunch of rings, like the ones used to teleport people in and out of ships in the Stargate series
Logged in just to up vote.
I actually use hextech sion when i play him.

we're half way there with headhunter rengar. our dreams will come true one day!

(flower pops up)
when suddenly, kog'maw

{{champion:96}} GIVE ME HYDRATION

{{champion:121}} WHAT THE HELL, KOG'MAW GET OFF OF ME!
AND WHY ON RUNETERRA ARE YOU DRESSED UP LIKE A BUTTERFLY?!?!

{{champion:96}} LET ME DRINK FROM THE FLOWER! I GOT LIKE, NO WATER FOR YEARS BECAUSE THERE ARE NO FLOWERS BIG ENOUGH!

{{champion:121}} DUDE STOP I NEED THIS THING I GOTTA RECALL

and so Kha'Zix killed Kog'Maw for invading his space
the end
flower power, all lanes covered {{champion:121}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:57}}
